https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6Rp3f1SQhlPZE52shuL7RwAiqIn.jpg Tokyo Incident's live Dynamite! All-round talent vocalist/pianist/guitarist/songwriter Shiina Ringo who's has strayed from her solo path since 2004 is back as essential part of the Tokyo Incidents. This time the explosive band offers an absorbing live cut of their premier Dynamite tour at Nagoya's International Conference Hall in February 2005. Offering fans their beloved catchy beats, this release includes their latest smash "Transparent World" (written by Kameda Seiji with lyrics by Shiina herself), the concert theme song Dynamite as well as the bonus track "Young Crowd â€“ Peaceful Days" among other top treats! This DVD features insightful behind-the-scenes trivia and comes with an exclusive booklet. Dynamite in
